In England, in the seven days to 11 July, there were 202,878 new confirmed cases (360.4 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 04 July, there were 155,490 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 30% (47,388 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 16 July is 4,640,922 (8,245.1 cases per 100,000 population).
